titles.title: Extending condolences to the family, friends, and loved ones of the late David Christopher Kelly, PhD.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 7/25/2003--Introduced. Expresses condolences to the family, friends, and loved ones of the late David Christopher Kelly, Ph.D. (a scientific advisor to the Proliferation and Arms Control Secretariat of the United Kingdom's Ministry of Defense, charged with dismantling Iraq's banned chemical, biological, and ballistic programs through the United Nations Special Commission, who also aided in reducing the danger of biological weapons in Russia).
